item.title: Accessing OpenStreetMap data with R
item.description: The database of Open Street Maps Recently I created a map of the distribution of gas stations and electric charging stations in Europe. Population density through the number of gas stations in Europe. #dataviz @AGE_Oficial @mipazos @simongerman600 @openstreetmap pic.twitter.com/eIUx2yn7ej — Dominic Royé (@dr_xeo) February 25, 2018 How can you obtain this data? Well, in this case I used points of interest (POIs) from the database of Open Street Maps (OSM).
